trans-unit.source: A factory class for creating <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> objects from Windows NT aliases, e-mail addresses, and security identifiers (SIDs).
trans-unit.target: Una classe factory per la creazione di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> oggetti da alias Windows NT, indirizzi di posta elettronica e gli identificatori di sicurezza (SID).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] All methods in ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory are static and no instance needs to be created.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Tutti i metodi in ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory sono statici e non deve essere creata alcuna istanza.

trans-unit.source: The constructor is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore è nascosto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration"></xref> object that is associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration"> </xref> oggetto a cui è associato il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration> object is used for changing the standard Active Directory schema properties that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> class uses.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration>oggetto viene utilizzato per modificare le proprietà dello schema di Active Directory standard che il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>utilizzato dalla classe.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration"> </xref> oggetto associato di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> using the specified Windows NT alias.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> utilizzando l'alias Windows NT specificato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>è un'implementazione concreta del <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole>classe astratta che viene utilizzato per accedere alla funzionalità Active Directory.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: In genere, l'archivio di Active Directory viene utilizzato per archiviare informazioni organizzative sul personale.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: Lo scopo principale per il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>per eseguire query su informazioni organizzative per ragioni aziendali.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: The alias string to create the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La stringa di alias per creare il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that describes the specified Windows NT alias.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> che descrive l'alias Windows NT specificato.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> using an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> utilizzando un indirizzo di posta elettronica.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>è un'implementazione concreta del <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole>classe astratta che viene utilizzato per accedere alla funzionalità Active Directory.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: In genere, l'archivio di Active Directory viene utilizzato per archiviare informazioni organizzative sul personale.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: Lo scopo principale per il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>per eseguire query su informazioni organizzative per ragioni aziendali.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: The e-mail address string from which to create the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La stringa di indirizzi di posta elettronica da cui creare il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that describes the specified e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> che descrive l'indirizzo di posta elettronica specificato.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> using a Windows NT <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> utilizzando Windows NT <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>è un'implementazione concreta del <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole>classe astratta che viene utilizzato per accedere alla funzionalità Active Directory.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: In genere, l'archivio di Active Directory viene utilizzato per archiviare informazioni organizzative sul personale.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: Lo scopo principale per il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>per eseguire query su informazioni organizzative per ragioni aziendali.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> to use to create the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref> da utilizzare per creare il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that describes the specified <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> che descrive l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>.
